member.name: ITfLMLattice.EnumLatticeElements
member.summary: Obtains an enumerator that contains all lattice elements contained in the lattice property that start at or after a specific offset from the start of the frame.
member.param: Specifies the offset, in 100-nanosecond units, relative to the start of the phrase, of the first element to obtain.
Specifies the lattice type identifier. This can be one of the Lattice Type values.
Pointer to an interface pointer that receives the enumerator object.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: rguidType is unsupported by the lattice property.

member.name: ITfLMLattice.QueryType
member.summary: Determines if a specific lattice element type is supported by the lattice property.
member.param: Specifies the lattice type identifier. This can be one of the Lattice Type values.

Pointer to a BOOL that receives a value that indicates if the lattice type is supported. If the lattice type is supported, this parameter receives a nonzero value and the method returns S_OK. If the lattice type is unsupported, this parameter receives zero and the method returns E_INVALIDARG.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: The specified lattice type is supported.
Either pfSupported is invalid or the specified lattice type is not supported.

member.name: ITfLMLattice
member.summary: The ITfLMLattice interface is implemented by the speech text service to provide information about lattice element properties and is used by a client (application or other text service). A client obtains this interface from the GUID_PROP_LMLATTICE property by calling . For more information, see Predefined Properties.
